channel.title: CVE Feed for Xorg -- libICE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xorg -- libICE

item.title: CVE-2017-2626|2024-08-05T14:02:06.904Z -- xorg -- libice
item.description: It was discovered that libICE before 1.0.9-8 used a weak entropy to generate keys. A local attacker could potentially use this flaw for session hijacking using the information available from the process list.
